lead_paragraph: Mattel posted a surprise increase in quarterly net sales, its first rise in more than two years, as sales of its Barbie dolls recovered and demand rose for its Hot Wheels toys.

headline.print_headline: Mattel’s Quarterly Sales Grow as Barbie Doll Choices Expand
headline.main: Mattel’s Quarterly Sales Grow as Barbie Doll Choices Expand

snippet: Mattel posted a surprise increase in quarterly net sales, its first rise in more than two years, as sales of its Barbie dolls recovered and demand rose for its Hot Wheels toys.
abstract: Mattel reports fourth-quarter profit of $215.2 million, or 63 cents a share, up 43.6 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue rose 0.3 percent to $2 billion; results exceed analyst expectations.
